inputs.doc: Forward reads produced as a part of a paired-end sequencing experiment. Multiple file inputs when libraries are pooled across >1 lanes

specs: http://sapac.support.illumina.com/sequencing/sequencing_software/bcl2fastq-conversion-software.html. Demultiplex and convert bcl files from Illumina platforms to fastq formats.

inputs.doc: Coordinates for regions discovered requiring realignment.

run.doc: calculates the ratio of x and y to infer sex. Use bam when sufficient coverage of x and y chromosomes

specs: In-house script to calculate bamsex statistics.
